con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsc="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v22" <wsc:Function>paymentAuthorizationCreate</wsc:Function> <wsc:Version>V2.1</wsc:Version> <wsc:ClientContext> <wsc:userid>${#TestSuite#userid}</wsc:userid> <wsc:customerid>${#TestSuite#customerid}</wsc:customerid> <wsc:locale>en</wsc:locale> <wsc:ip>1.1.1.1</wsc:ip> <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value1}" key="${#TestSuite#item1}"/> <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value2}" key="${#TestSuite#item2}"/> <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value3}" key="${#TestSuite#item3}"/> <wsc:item value="${#TestSuite#value4}" key="${#TestSuite#item4}"/> </wsc:ClientContext> </wsc:AutHeader> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <urn:PaymentCreateRequest> <urn:paymentMessage> <urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000) + 1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentIdentification> <urn1:paymentInfo> <urn3:paymentMethod>TRF</urn3:paymentMethod> <!--Optional:--> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn3:requestedExecutionDate>${#TestSuite#ReqExnDate}</urn3:requestedExecutionDate> <urn3:debtorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#debitAccountEur}</urn2:identification> <urn2:currency>${#TestSuite#debitAccountEurCCY}</urn2:currency> <!--Optional:--> </urn3:debtorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:paymentInfo> <urn1:transaction> <urn4:amount> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <urn2:instructedAmount currency="EUR"> <urn2:amount>1</urn2:amount> </urn2:instructedAmount> </urn4:amount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:chargeBearer>SHAR</urn4:chargeBearer> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <urn4:creditorAgent> <urn2:bic>${#TestSuite#sepaCredAgent}</urn2:bic> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:country>${#TestSuite#intCredAgentCountry}</urn2:country> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditorAgent> <urn4:creditor> <urn2:name>Creditorsepa</urn2:name> <urn2:postalAddress> <urn2:addressType>ADDR</urn2:addressType> <urn2:streetName>streetName</urn2:streetName> <urn2:postCode>1234</urn2:postCode> <urn2:townName>townName</urn2:townName> </urn2:postalAddress> </urn4:creditor> <urn4:creditorAccount> <urn2:identification>${#TestSuite#intCreditAccount}</urn2:identification> <!--Optional:--> </urn4:creditorAccount> <!--Optional:--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn1:transaction> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> <!--Optional:--> </urn:paymentMessage> </urn:PaymentCreateRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
